title: ninnu vinA mari galadA
sahitya:
ninnu vinA mari galadA gati lOkamulO niranjani nikhila janani mrDAni bhavAni amba


anupallavi

  pannaga bhUSaNuni rANi pArvati janani amba parAku sEyakarAdu vinu shrI brhadamba vinumu


caraNam 1    pAmarunammA dayajEsi varamIyammA mAyammA pApamella pariharinci birAna brOcuTaku
    caraNam 2    sArasamulEni bhava jaladhi tagulu koni cAla vEsAritini nA vicAramu dIrcuTaku
    caraNam 3    nA madilO amba nIvE gatiyani nammiti shyAmakrSNanutA bhakta paripAlanamu sEyuTaku
